Introduction

Taecyeon is a South Korean rapper, singer-songwriter, actor and entrepreneur under 51K. He is the main rapper of the boy group 2PM.

On July 25, 2018, it was announced that Taecyeon had signed with 51K following his contract expiration with JYP Entertainment after deciding to not renew, but will still be active as a member of 2PM.

He made his acting debut in 2010 on KBS2 in the drama "Cinderella Sister".
